name: Two Ply
description:
F1 - Toggle Fullscreen

A,D / Left, Right Arrow Keys to Move

W / Up Arrow Key to Jump

Spacebar to Wrap Certain Objects

"March 2020. When everyone desperately needed... toilet paper..."

You take on the role of Two Ply, a terrified roll of toilet paper that needs to escape the supermarket before being caught. Along the way collect vouchers for "FREE TOILET ROLLS" in order to help save the rest of your double comforted comrades. Also remember, beware the hands that grab...

This is a silly game idea I had back way when things were just ramping up around the globe and certain people couldn't help but be utter fools in supermarkets.

So you might be thinking - hang on, getting toilet paper isn't a problem anymore, therefore this joke is already dated right? WRONG! It was never really that funny to me in the first place however when I started this *(cough) a while back I hadn't planned on working on it for so long and I kept coming back to add stuff to it, I couldn't let it go, got bloaty yadda yadda yadda anyway it's done! Come and play it! 

Let me know what you think and please follow me to see more of my games in the future.

The bits you play and see - made by me

The bits you hear - made by Kieran Whitehouse

*This game is COVID free. Stay safe everyone.
